ThingDef.label: reproductive organs (carry)
ThingDef.description: Reproductive organs that enable carrying pregnancies. Can be surgically transplanted.

ThingDef.label: reproductive organs (sire)
ThingDef.description: Reproductive organs that enable siring offspring. Can be surgically transplanted.

ThingDef.label: basic reproductive prosthetic (carry)
ThingDef.description: A basic prosthetic reproductive system that enables carrying pregnancies. Reduces carry fertility by 30% compared to natural organs but provides reliable function.

ThingDef.label: basic reproductive prosthetic (sire)
ThingDef.description: A basic prosthetic reproductive system that enables siring offspring. Reduces sire fertility by 30% compared to natural organs but provides reliable function.

ThingDef.label: bionic reproductive prosthetic (carry)
ThingDef.description: A bionic reproductive system that enables carrying pregnancies with perfect contraception control. Increases carry fertility by 20%, guarantees pregnancy when both partners have bionics and want children, prevents pregnancy when the bionic user wants to avoid it.

ThingDef.label: bionic reproductive prosthetic (sire)
ThingDef.description: A bionic reproductive system that enables siring offspring with perfect contraception control. Increases sire fertility by 20%, guarantees pregnancy when both partners have bionics and want children, prevents pregnancy when the bionic user wants to avoid it.
